vuba.cast_contours¶

vuba.cast_contours(contours, x, y)[source]¶

Convenience function to cast contour(s) to a given x,y.

Parameters

  • contours (list or ndarray) – Contour(s) to cast.

  • x (int) – x position to cast to.

  • y (int) – y position to cast to.

Returns

contours – Contours casted to new coordinates.

Return type

list of ndarray

See also

find_contours, draw_contours
